item.title: Pingu has made his debut on Youtube!
item.article:
Watch the fantastic Eskimo Disco '7-11' music video featuring Pingu!


Click here to visit Youtube

item.title: Pingu on MySpace
item.article:
Become ‘friends’ with Pingu by visiting his very own MySpace Page!


Click here to make friends!

item.title: Pingu DVD Release
item.article:
The best new Pingu episodes will all be available on the new ‘Platinum Collection’ DVD


Out in January!

item.title: Pingu at Butlins
item.article:
Pingu regularly appears as a meet and greet character across all 3 Butlins resorts.


Visit Butlins and you could have the chance to meet him!
